subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Western Kentucky took its No. 12 seed and all but whacked fifth-seeded Illinois over the head with it, reaffirming our faith in the wonderfulness of the first round.
snippet: Western Kentucky took its No. 12 seed and all but whacked fifth-seeded Illinois over the head with it, reaffirming our faith in the wonderfulness of the first round.
